plays.text: Penalty to Rob Blake 2 minutes for Tripping Sami Kapanen served by Rob Blake
Penalty to Kim Johnsson 2 minutes for Crosschecking Dan Hinote served by Kim Johnsson
Penalty to Alex Tanguay 2 minutes for Hooking Sami Kapanen served by Alex Tanguay
Penalty to Serge Aubin 2 minutes for Hooking Marty Murray served by Serge Aubin
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice served by Guillaume Lefebvre
Goal scored by Peter Forsberg assisted by Radim Vrbata and Steve Reinprecht
Penalty to Jeff Shantz 2 minutes for Hooking Donald Brashear served by Jeff Shantz
Goal scored by Kim Johnsson assisted by Mark Recchi and Michal Handzus
Penalty to Todd Warriner 2 minutes for Hooking Radim Vrbata served by Todd Warriner
Penalty to Kim Johnsson 2 minutes for Closing Hand on Puck Alex Tanguay served by Kim Johnsson
Penalty to Mark Recchi 2 minutes for Roughing Adam Foote served by Mark Recchi
Penalty to Adam Foote 2 minutes for Roughing Mark Recchi served by Adam Foote
Goal scored by Peter Forsberg unassisted
